duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate regulatory impact of change controls and site investigations, ensuring adherence to registration submissions for facilities, equipment, and processes.

Initiate, lead working groups, and manage projects/changes to accomplish change activities/project deliverables and/or whole projects; responsible for prioritization and associated timely completion of activities/deliverables and/or project timelines.
Anticipate issues and elevate them to appropriate management attention immediately. Oversee site commitment system for site metric and reporting tracking.
Proactively identify, take remedial action, and/or seek advice when a personal, project, or team goal/deliverable is off schedule.

Interface with and represent Quality Assurance in cross-departmental/cross-site/cross-network meetings, manage working area and projects/changes to accomplish change activities/project deliverables and/or whole projects.
Provide guidance/coaching to less experienced colleagues. Support regulatory audits as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in biotechnology, pharmaceutical sciences, or a related field (Master's preferred)
